name: International Marine Contractors' Association
goal: The International Marine Contractors Association (IMCA) is the international trade association representing companies and organisations engaged in delivering offshore, marine and underwater solutions. Our core purpose is improving performance in the marine contracting industry by championing better regulation and enhancing operational integrity.
interests: Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
IMCA is interested in all EU activities, initiatives and regulatory processes which are related to the offshore energy (including oil, gas and renewables) and maritime sectors.
This includes potential extension of the product directives to the MODU sector, carbon monitoring, reporting & verification initiatives, the security directive and offshore liability.
IMCA participates in the EU offshore authorities group (EUOAG).
